Name:
Beatty
Carabobo
Builder: Bethlehem Mariners Harbor, Staten Island, New York
Fate:
To Venezuela 14 July 1972
Stricken and scrapped in 1981.
Armament:
6 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 cal. guns,
12 × 40 mm AA guns,
11 × 20 mm AA guns,
10 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes,
6 × depth charge projectors,
2 × depth charge tracks
